EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email invitation template for survey: Customer Service Survey
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Workflow User] Customer Service Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: Customer Service Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(User.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'http://valspar.force.com/timbasurveys__survey?id=a1QE0000000Aq6tMAC&uId=' + User.Id + '&case_id=' + Case.Id + '&wf=yes','http://valspar.force.com/timbasurveys__survey?id=a1QE0000000Aq6tMAC&uId=' + User.Id + '&wf=yes'),'')}
